a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate from indoor air pollution in 1990 vs. 2021
Death rates from indoor air pollution in 1990 versus 2021, measured as the number of deaths per 100,000
Death rate from indoor air pollution in 2021 (deaths per 100,000 people)
Death rate from indoor air pollution in 1990 (deaths per 100,000
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
